name: Link.Game
description:
Link "dot" Game

Made for GMTK2021

Connect the dots in this challenging arcade/puzzle game!
You must be fast to link the dots before they break your link and balance your ambitions in a clever risk and reward dilemma!

Simple mouse controls! Press and Hold to link.
Release to cancel (does get useful)

Rules:

  • Always Link at least 3 dots in a closed cycle
  • Do not let Lines cross (closing link exempt)
  • Do not let dots touch a link (point penalty and -1 health)
  • Bigger chains more points
  • Join all dots before time runs out!
